entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Exception from dotnet build for project using JsonPolymorphic with TypeDiscriminatorPropertyName #104064
  • runtime-coreclr gcstress0x3-gcstress0xc has been failing for the past month #104062
  • baseservices/threading/commitstackonlyasneeded/DefaultStackCommit/DefaultStackCommit.cmd timed out #104058
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: Regressions/coreclr/GitHub_89834/test89834/test89834.cmd #104057
    9.0.0
  • Should we dispose EventLog if there was an Interop.Errors.ERROR_INVALID_PARAMETER? #104053
  • [API Proposal]: "Multipart/form-data" serializer #104050
  • System.IO.FileSystem.AccessControl depends on deprecated version of System.Security.AccessControl #104047
  • [API Proposal]: Expose polymorphic base type in `JsonSchemaExporterContext` #104046
    9.0.0
  • The job running on agent NetCore-Public ran longer than the maximum time #104044
  • Test failing: ServiceProviderILEmitContainerTests.GetAsyncService_DisposeAsyncOnSameThread_ThrowsAndDoesNotHangAndDisposeAsyncGetsCalled #104041
    9.0.0
  • BIGENDIAN not defined while building eventpipe on s390x #104036
  • Support configuring the default build architecture using an environment variable #104033
  • [Android][arm] Algorithm 'RC2' not supported on Android causing failures in X509Certificates tests #104030
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `runtime/main` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #104023
  • Community-supported platforms runtime and sdk installation via dotnet-install #104020
  • Expression compiles incorrectly due to incorrect reuse of temporary variables in StackSpiller #104018
  • [API Proposal]: Add `TagList` constructor to `Measurement` #104015
    Future
  • Some docs still mention mariner 2.0 #104013
    Future
  • [Android] PlatformNotSupported failures inside System.Net.Security.Tests #104010

Closed

  • runtime-coreclr outerloop pipeline cannot be started #104059
  • `!pe` in windbg does not print first chance exception details #100943
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 2 Regressions on 11/4/2023 4:52:33 AM #94476
  • Test failure GC/Scenarios/muldimjagary/muldimjagary/muldimjagary.sh #94157
  • DOTNET_GCHeapHardLimitPercent being ignored without warnings #100804
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `runtime/main` can't be mirrored to Azdo fast forward branch #104021
  • .NET6 -- Fatal error. Internal CLR error. (0x80131506) #99745
  • [NETSDKE2E]Native symbols cannot be resolved with PerfView tool. #97137
  • Delete UseWindowsThreadpool special casing #101591
    9.0.0
  • FileSystemWatcher on sub-directory prevents parent directory from being renamed #103383
  • [mono] Incorrect cast_class for IntPtr[] #97145
    9.0.0
  • Failed test: JIT/jit64/opt/cse/VolatileTest_op_* for add, or and shr #103980
    9.0.0
  • Test issue: AccessViolationException on CodeAnalysis.CSharp.Binder.BindConstructorInitializerCoreContinued #104042
  • JIT: Lowering's insertion of `PUTARG_*` nodes is questionable #103300
    9.0.0
  • Source generator tests failing with AV in Roslyn #102919
    9.0.0
  • Confused about NuGet package versions #102889
  • System.Text.Json.Nodes.Tests.JsonObjectTests.NullPropertyNameFail [FAIL] #103784
    9.0.0
  • Dotnet Maui Microsoft.Data.SqlClient Version="5.1.1" Android .Net 7 vs .Net 8 #92612
  • Compiling mono for android on windows fails #89496
  • Test failure: Unknown chain building error in System.Net.Security.CertificateValidationRemoteServer.ConnectWithRevocation_WithCallback #101835
    9.0.0
  • Selecting Network Interface for Socket Connections #81698
  • Issue with ICU Library Update on Ubuntu 24.2 LTS Affecting String Formatting in .NET 8.0 #104031
  • [8.0] [mono] Assert failed in ConsolePal.GetBufferInfo #92417
    9.0.0
  • System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.HttpMetricsTest_Http11_Async_HttpMessageInvoker Test failure #96407
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Expose the remaining const values in TimeSpan #94545
    9.0.0
  • Behaviour change in HTTPHeaders.Add between .NET 6.0 and 8.0? #99416
    9.0.0
  • iOS-net7 simple_nursery_serial_scan_object invalid GC type desc #85379
    9.0.0
  • [mono] mono_gc_init_finalizer_thread #92110
    9.0.0
  • Arm64/Sve: GatherVector* tests are failing for MinOpts #103854
    9.0.0
  • [wasm][mono] conflicting naming for wasm import/export #102844
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal] AllowListSerializationBinder #104037
    9.0.0
  • mono/mini/interp/interp.c crash in System.Text.Encodings.Web.Tests #100850
    9.0.0
  • `System.Linq.Queryable.Tests` native crash for `mono_interpreter` `Debian.11.Amd64` #93990
    9.0.0
  • iOS: "MONO interpreter: NIY encountered in method ReadTestCase_DataFromJson" when deserializing class with 200 fields #100753
  • [API Proposal]: Adding DisposeAsync to HttpResponseMessage and HttpContent #102571
    9.0.0
  • [browser] HybridGlobalization Invariant function differs from non-Hybrid #95471
    9.0.0
  • French abbreviated month names not showing up as expected #90639
    9.0.0
  • Remove the `NullabilityInfoContext.IsSupported` feature switch #103298
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: System.Text.Json.Serialization.JsonPropertyNameAttribute should be applicable to primary constructor arguments of record classes. #104019
  • [browser] HybridGlobalization, invalid `TimeOnly` #95594
    9.0.0
  • [Test Failure] System.Net.Security.Tests.CertificateValidationClientServer.CertificateValidationClientServer_EndToEnd_Ok on Windows AoT #88832
    9.0.0
  • Process terminated. Assertion failed. in System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests #103911
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed '(className[9] == '\0') || (strcmp(className + 9, "\`1") == 0)' in 'System.Runtime.Intrinsics.Boxed_Vector512DebugView\`1[System.__Canon]:get_UInt64View_Unbox():ulong[]:this' during 'Pre-import' #103986
    9.0.0
  • Publishing for linux-arm64 on Linux x64 with NativeAot and StripSymbols uses objcopy instead of aarch64-linux-gnu-objcopy #84769
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: trim-safe RuntimeHelpers.RunClassConstructor(Type) overload #103679
    Future
  • ILC: FileNotFoundException for base type from unresolved assembly #103843
  • Create native host for application with only runtime installed #103746
  • .NET 9 Preview 5 WebAssembly debugging broken #103976
  • Arm64/Sve: PrefetchBytes16 fails on InvalidInput instead of throwing `ArgumentOutOfRangeException` #104006

PullRequests

Created

  • Add draft of runtime async ECMA-335 changes #104063
    area-Meta
  • [nomerge] [GC] Add verification and logging to region_free_list #104061
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix type parsing issues in ILLink and ILC #104060
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • Set value for BIGENDIAN #104056
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Add ValueType to the core types used by ref emit #104055
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Improve getStaticFieldContent for classes without cctors #104054
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Repair very old merge damage and update comments #104052
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • JIT: Unify LSRA call arg building #104051
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update Mono to handle various other vector bitcast APIs #104049
    area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • Show the linker cmake is using #104045
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Change X509CertificateLoader to wrap unsupported algorithms with a CryptographicException #104040
    area-System.Security, os-android
  • ARm64/Sve: Fix the SVE_ComputeAddress* #104039
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arm-sve
  • [mini] Use atomics instead of loader lock for JIT wrappers and trampolines #104038
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [H/3] Wait for `WritesClosed` and `Dispose` as fire-and-forget #104035
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [QUIC] Adding `CompletWritesAsync` #104032
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic
  • Test HybridGlobalization with AOT on CI #104027
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Enable `TryFormat_MatchesToString` for `HybridGlobalization` #104026
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, disabled-test
  • Delete ARM32-specific interface dispatch code #104024
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [Android] Fix SslStreamCertificateContext empty custom trust store exception #104016
    area-System.Net.Security, os-android
  • Fix definite assignment error in regex source gen for some lazy loops #104007
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Add SYSLIB0056 to list of diagnostics #104005
    needs-area-label

Merged

  • Generalize IControlFlowGraph successors #103676
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Fix JsonNode performance regression #104048
    area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • Do not warn on `MakeGeneric` when `class` constraint present #104029
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove handling of UseWindowsThreadPool in ILC targets #104011
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] Use correct cast_class for IntPtr[] #103841
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Disable VolatileTest tests under GCStress #104043
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Check for call interference when placing PUTARG nodes #103301
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Rename `Module::IsReflection` and `PEAssembly::IsDynamic` to `IsReflectionEmit` #103999
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Disable trimming of library tests on Apple mobile #104028
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Add support for Sve.VectorTableLookup() #103989
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Fix failing tests and refine a number of exception message assertions. #104034
    area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • Avoid rare deadlocks when using TypeDescriptor #103835
    area-System.ComponentModel, 9.0.0
  • Cleanup certificates before running ConnectWithRevocation_WithCallback_Core on Windows #104014
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Remove format job runs from coreclr outerloop testing #103979
    area-Infrastructure
  • Expose the constants in TimeSpan #103993
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, area-System.DateTime, 9.0.0
  • Added test for missing cookie header value #103969
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [wasi][mono] Fix conflicting naming for wasm import/export #103881
    area-Interop-mono
  • [mono][interp] Improve precision of native offset estimation #103956
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Update CredScanSuppressions.json with new TestData.cs path #104025
    area-Infrastructure
  • [browser] Fix: `HybridGlobalization` Invariant function differs from non-Hybrid #103037
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, os-browser
  • Remove NullabilityInfoContext.IsSupported feature switch #103970
    area-System.Reflection
  • Also pass NETCoreSdkRuntimeIdentifier to runtime.proj #104012
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Enable `AllCulturesTest` for HybridGlobalization #103961
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, disabled-test
  • JIT: Handle QMARK properly for LCL_ADDR propagation #103909
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Switch `genCall` to new ABI info and unify targets #103866
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • optimize the store/restore for calleeSavedRegs. #101472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable ControlFlowGuard in cdacreader #104009
    needs-area-label
  • Remove allocation of state machine in QuicStream.WriteAsync #103902
    area-System.Net
  • Fix potential Debug.Assert in QuicListener #103965
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Use a proper check rather than an assert #103995
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ARM64-SVE: Fix gather tests #103966
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • [release/8.0] Fix incorrect time patterns for some cultures on browser in `HybridGlobalization` #103964
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Extend RunClassConstructor intrinsic handling to accept NonPublicConstructors #103947
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Improve resiliency when rooting broken assemblies #103962
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix alpine debug build #103871
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Ensure static constructor is reflection-callable when NonPublicConstructors were kept #103946
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove `MODULE_READY_FOR_TYPELOAD` flag on `Module` #103990
    area-VM-coreclr

Updated

  • Port yield normalization from CoreCLR to Native AOT #103675
    area-System.Threading
  • Activities for Http Connections, Dns, Sockets and SslStream #103922
    area-System.Net, 9.0.0
  • Enable sending activation to dispatch queue threads #102887
    area-PAL-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2483270 #103583
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Avoid long busy-waiting between hijack retries. #103212
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix assertion/possible deadlock in thread shutdown in the presence of ThreadStatics on collectible assemblies #104003
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Minimize locking duration for decommitLock #103996
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Stack allocate unescaped boxes #103361
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Added SVE APIs `CreateMaskForFirstActiveElement` and `CreateMaskForNextActiveElement` #104002
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Some System.Decimal performance improvements #99212
    area-System.Numerics, no-recent-activity, needs-author-action
  • Add CancellationToken support for LoadIntoBufferAsync #103991
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT: ARM64 - Added SVE APIs `ExtractLastVector`, `ExtractLastScalar`, `ExtractAfterLastVector`, `ExtractAfterLastScalar` #103847
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Consolidate LocateNativeCompiler target #103375
    NO-MERGE, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Migrate to zlib-ng, part 2: consume it in runtime #102403
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Use the same method to generate DllImportAttribute in local methods and P/Invoke forwarders #103973
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] emscripten bump 3.1.56 #100334
    area-Build-mono
  • Update mono to support Unsafe.BitCast #103915
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Make GC stress usable with Libraries tests #103738
    test-enhancement, area-VM-coreclr
  • Add AppContext switch for OCSP Stapling #100917
    area-System.Net.Security, 9.0.0
  • [ICorProfiler] Add new API to enumerate GC Heap objects #103735
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [release/6.0-staging] Fix #103485 #103935
    area-Infrastructure
  • Convert some more array FCalls to managed #102739
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add support for Sve.DuplicateSelectedScalarToVector() #103228
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Fix #97736 in MemoryCache.cs with a lock around the TriggerOvercapacityC... method #103992
    area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution
  • Guard remaining IErrorInfo usage under FEATURE_COMINTEROP #103510
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Fix the race condition issue of aot_module loading #103975
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [release/8.0 staging] Port fix for 103477 to 8.0 #103918
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • Fix `NamespaceCache` usage in `System.Private.Xml.Linq` #101158
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • remove unnecessary Avx512VL ISA flags. #103144
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution, avx512
  • Fix StackOverflowException in Configuration.Binder source generator #103822
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Disable cleanup of RuntimeThreadLocals during shutdown #103877
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr
  • JIT: Optimize out write barriers for fields in ref-like structs #103503
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add randomized allocation sampling #100356
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [cdac] Implement ISOSDacInterface::GetNestedExceptionData #103668
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Optimize performance of `Measurement` constructor #103978
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution
  • Fix static-lib AOT Mono builds #103988
    area-Build-mono
  • [NativeAOT] Adding CET support #102680
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add System.Text fuzzing for encoders #103968
    area-System.Text.Encoding
  • ARM64-SVE: Add SVE registers to pal context #103801
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Print linking instructions for NativeLib=static #103960
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [Test Only] Force cfg #103215
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • bump npm dependencies and lock file format #103639
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V][LoongArch64] New passing info for floating-point structs #103945
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, arch-riscv
  • Add JsonPascalCaseNamingPolicy #100017
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64-mono] Part-1:Add native code emission module for LoongArch64 #103403
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [LoongArch64] Add nativeaot support on LoongArch64. #103889
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, arch-loongarch64
  • [browser][MT] Make ChangeLocalTimeZone thread-safe #103953
    arch-wasm, os-browser
  • Avoid scanning typeof checks when building whole program view #103883
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • fix the size passed to grow_heap_segment from loh_allocate_in_condemned #103998
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Change temporary entrypoints to be lazily allocated #101580
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Try SimdUnicode for Utf8 validation #103860
    area-System.Text.Encoding
  • [cdac] start of Metadata contract; implement GetMethodTableData SOS method #103444
